footer.description: Discover the legendary Uluwatu Temple in Bali, perched on a stunning cliff with breathtaking ocean views.
footer.copyright: © copyright 2025 Uluwatu Temple. All Rights Reserved.

hero.title: Welcome to Uluwatu Temple
hero.description: Discover the spiritual beauty and stunning cliffside views of Uluwatu. We invite you to explore the traditions, culture, and sacred atmosphere of one of Bali’s most iconic temples.

section.title: Exploring the Charms of Culture and Natural Beauty
section.paragraph: Welcome to Uluwatu, a gem on the southern tip of Bali that blends the stunning beauty of ocean cliffs with the rich spirituality of ancient temples. It is here, amidst a breathtaking sunset panorama, that you can witness the legendary Kecak Dance performance, an unforgettable cultural experience. Dive deeper into the charm of Uluwatu and discover why this place has become one of the most sacred and iconic destinations on the Island of the Gods.

dos.title: Buy Entrance Ticket
dos.desc: Always purchase your ticket at the official entrance gate.

dos.title: Wear a Sarong and Sash
dos.desc: Sarong and sash are provided at the entrance as a sign of respect.

dos.title: Dress Modestly and Comfortably
dos.desc: Proper attire is required as this is a sacred site.

dos.title: Behave Respectfully
dos.desc: Follow local customs and maintain a respectful demeanor.

dos.title: Explore with a Local Guide
dos.desc: Learn about Uluwatu’s rich history, culture, and natural beauty with a guide.

dos.title: Take Photos
dos.desc: Capture the beauty of Uluwatu Temple, but respect restricted areas.

dos.title: Use Your Camera Safely
dos.desc: Hold your camera securely to prevent accidental drops or theft by monkeys.

dos.title: Handle Your Phone Carefully
dos.desc: Be cautious when using your phone, as monkeys may try to snatch it.

dos.title: Secure Your Belongings
dos.desc: Keep sunglasses, hats, and bags away from mischievous monkeys.

dos.title: Watch the Kecak Dance at Sunset
dos.desc: Enjoy the famous Kecak Dance while admiring Bali’s stunning sunset.

dos.title: Park in Designated Areas
dos.desc: Use official parking zones to avoid fines or inconvenience.

donts.title: Do Not Feed the Monkeys
donts.desc: Feeding them disrupts their natural behavior and should only be done under staff supervision.

donts.title: Do Not Touch, Catch, or Disturb the Monkeys
donts.desc: They are sacred and should be left alone.

donts.title: Do Not Enter Sacred Areas
donts.desc: Only authorized personnel and worshippers may enter the temple’s restricted zones.

donts.title: Menstruating Women Should Not Enter Temple Areas
donts.desc: This is a traditional rule in Balinese Hindu temples.

donts.title: Do Not Sit or Climb on Boundary Walls
donts.desc: The cliffs are steep and dangerous.

donts.title: No Food or Drink Allowed
donts.desc: Bringing food or beverages into the temple grounds is not allowed.

donts.title: Do Not Wear Jewelry
donts.desc: Avoid flashy accessories that might attract monkeys.

donts.title: Do Not Use Drones
donts.desc: Drone use is strictly prohibited unless with permission.

donts.title: Do Not Bring Sharp Objects
donts.desc: Knives or other sharp items are not allowed inside.

dos.title: Arrive Early
dos.desc: The best seats are available to those who arrive before 5 PM.

dos.title: Dress Modestly
dos.desc: As it’s part of Uluwatu Temple, proper attire is required.

dos.title: Wear Comfortable Shoes
dos.desc: The amphitheater seating is made of stone, so comfortable footwear is recommended.

dos.title: Bring Sunglasses & Water
dos.desc: The sunset is bright, and the amphitheater can get hot.

dos.title: Follow Seating Arrangements
dos.desc: Respect designated seating to ensure a smooth experience for all.

dos.title: Respect the Performers
dos.desc: Keep quiet and avoid using flash photography during the show.

donts.title: No Drone Flying
donts.desc: Drones are not permitted to preserve the temple’s serenity and safety.

donts.title: Do Not Use Flash Photography
donts.desc: Flashes disturb both performers and the audience.

donts.title: Do Not Stand or Move During the Performance
donts.desc: Walking around can disrupt others and distract from the show.

donts.title: Do Not Speak Loudly
donts.desc: Keep voices low to maintain the sacred atmosphere of the performance.

donts.title: Do Not Bring Large Bags
donts.desc: Backpacks or large suitcases may not be allowed inside the seating area.

donts.title: No Smoking Inside the Venue
donts.desc: Smoking is strictly prohibited within the amphitheater.

kecakPage.openGateNote: To secure the best seats, visitors are encouraged to arrive at least one hour before the performance begins. As the show is highly popular, tickets may sell out quickly, especially during peak seasons.

whereToBuy.booth: Official Ticket Booth: Located at Uluwatu Temple entrance
whereToBuy.online: Online Reservations: Some platforms may offer pre-booking options for convenience

importantNotes.fees: Parking fees and area entrance fees are NOT included in the Kecak Dance ticket price
importantNotes.payment: Payments are generally cash-only, so prepare the exact amount before arrival

kecakPage.whyUniqueTitle: WHY IS KECAK DANCE PERFORMANCE UNIQUE?

section1.title: No Musical Instruments, Only Chanting
section1.description: Unlike traditional Balinese dance performances that are fully accompanied by a gamelan orchestra, Kecak Dance relies entirely on the synchronized chanting of dozens or even hundreds of male performers. Their interlocked vocal sounds create a hypnotic rhythm, mimicking the percussive sounds of a traditional orchestra. This unique vocal harmony builds intensity throughout the show, drawing the audience deeper into the story.

section2.title: Fire Performance in Hanuman's Battle Scene
section2.description: One of the most thrilling aspects of Kecak Dance is the fire performance, usually during the climactic scene of Hanuman, the white monkey warrior, in his ablaze battle. Dressed in traditional Balinese attire, a dancer performs symbolic elements representing purification and divine power. This fiery spectacle is a truly astonishing moment that leaves the audience in awe.

section3.title: Performed on a Cliffside with a Breathtaking Sunset
section3.description: The Uluwatu Temple amphitheater provides an unmatched setting for Kecak Dance. Located atop a dramatic ocean cliff, with panoramic views of the Indian Ocean, the sun sets behind the temple, creating a magical backdrop of golden hues and crashing waves. This combination of mythology, spiritual ambiance, and natural significance makes this experience truly unforgettable.

prewedding.title: PREWEDDING & PHOTOGRAPHY
prewedding.subtitle: Capture Your Dream Wedding Moments in Uluwatu & Labuan Sait
prewedding.whyTitle: Why Choose Uluwatu & Labuan Sait for Your Prewedding Photoshoot?
prewedding.whyDescription: Bali is a dream destination for couples looking for stunning prewedding photography locations, and Uluwatu Temple and Labuan Sait Beach stand out as two of the most breathtaking backdrops. With their majestic cliffs, golden sunsets, and rich cultural heritage, these locations provide an unforgettable setting for capturing love stories.

locations.cliffside: Uluwatu Temple Cliffside – Overlooking the vast Indian Ocean.
locations.amphitheater: Uluwatu Amphitheater – A cultural backdrop blending Balinese architecture and ocean views.
locations.rockFormations: Labuan Sait Beach Rock Formations – Unique limestone formations.
locations.sunset: Sunset at Labuan Sait – The golden hour enhances the natural beauty.

themes.traditional: Traditional Balinese Elegance – Wearing Balinese attire.
themes.adventurous: Adventurous & Scenic – Featuring dramatic cliffside landscapes.
themes.casual: Casual & Beachy – Relaxed, intimate shots with soft waves and golden sands.

price.permits: Photography permits may be required depending on location and duration.
price.privateSession: Exclusive private sessions are available upon request.
price.contact: Contact Uluwatu Temple Management Office for photography permits.

prewedding.guidelinesNote: Visitors must respect the sacred nature of the location. Please dress modestly and follow local cultural customs when shooting in temple areas.

contact.title: Emergency Contacts
contact.description: Reach out to the relevant personnel in case of any emergency.
contact.note: This information is subject to change.

contacts.description: For security issues around the temple area.

contacts.name: Mrs. Ayu
